summary: block: Do not call blk_put_queue() if gendisk allocation fails
details:
block: Do not call blk_put_queue() if gendisk allocation fails

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0 by commit aa0c680c3aa96a5f9f160d90dd95402ad578e2b0, it was introduced in version v6.0 by commit 6f8191fdf41d3a53cc1d63fe2234e812c55a0092. For more details please see the references link.
